FuncDef: This command monitors arbiter statistics in an ingress FP queue group.
CLIs: card <slot-number> fp <fp-number> queue-group <queue-group-name> instance <instance-id> [ ingress ] [ access | networks ] [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | percent-rate [ <reference-rate> ] ] [ arbiter root | <name> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the slot number associated with the queue group, expressed as an integer. Values-1 to 20.
Specifies the FP number associated with the queue group, expressed as an integer. Values-1 to 8.
Displays policer statistics applied on the ingress FP.
Displays policer statistics on the FP access.
Displays policer statistics on the FP network.
Specifies the name of the queue group up to 32 characters.
Specifies the identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 65535.
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-11 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 11 seconds
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
When the absolute keyword is specified, the raw statistics are displayed, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
When the percent-rate keyword is specified, the rate-per-second for each statistic is displayed based on the reference rate of 10G.
When a reference-rate value is specified, the rate-per-second for each statistic is displayed as a percentage based on the reference rate specified. Values-100M, 1G, 10G, 40G, 100G, 400G.

Specify the name of the policer control policy arbiter. Values-An existing arbiter-name in the form of a string up to 32 characters, composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, etc.), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes..
